defaultItem.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Donec odio. Quisque volutpat mattis eros. Nullam malesuada erat ut turpis. Suspendisse urna nibh, viverra non, semper suscipit, posuere a, pede.

defaultItem.quote: There are only two hard things in Computer Science: cache invalidation and naming things.
defaultItem.author: Phil Karlton
